name: Joy Reyes-Madamba
text: I have Way of Kings but I haven't started because apparently this series is going to have more than 5 books.  😕

source_obj.text: I have Way of Kings but I haven't started because apparently this series is going to have more than 5 books.  😕

replies.text: Book 1 + Book 2 are perfectly fine to read by themselves, nde ka mabibitin. It's better than waiting for Winds of Winter lol
